text: I was not satisfied with the packaging and shipping costs and the time it took to be delivered. author: Marketing lies
text: I purchased this mesh baseball cap and when it came in the mail it was the smallest hat I’ve ever seen.  There was no size on the site and I assumed it was adjustable.  It is not.  Worst purchase and worst customer service.  The charged me $70 to re-stock an item they miss advertised.
title: I purchased this mesh baseball cap and…

author: JRD
text: I reached out to customer service 4x via a well mannered email with no response (a consignment coordinator did email back stating she couldn't help and I needed to connect w/ customer service). I purchased less than a handful of other up-cycled items in the past, and were fine, but after inspecting the last items I ordered, I questioned the authenticity (I have photos of the products which I sent to the customer service people). Truly negative experience with lack of communication from their support team. Shame that some unauthentic items are being circulated on the site as there are lovely items. Learning lesson for me and be careful with the items you are choosing as you don't want be suckered as I was.
title: Authenticity of Several Items Questionable

author: customer
text: I purchased Gucci Square Gradient Sunglasses on 4.2.22 which had been described as in "excellent" condition. When they arrived, the glasses were covered in filth and the lenses are scratched so badly over the field of vision that I cannot see clearly while wearing them. To add insult to injury, they are non-returnable and I spent a significant amount of money on them. I will not purchase sunglasses from this site again as the item description cannot be trusted.
title: Gucci Sunglasses

text: I will never buy from the Real Real again.  I was told that I could return a Chanel bag within three days.  The day I received it I called because it was not as nice as I had hoped.  Customer service gave me the run around and I had to ask to speak to a supervisor before I was given a return shipping label.  Not a good experience and will not shop there again.
title: I will never buy from the Real Real…

author: Fathima
text:
By law they are supposed to collect sales tax for shipments to US but not for shipments outside of US. (check their zendesk link on this)

However for a pair of glasses, I paid $51 and shipping to Australia, they have charged sales tax of $12.60 which is nearly 25%. They refused to refund and made all sorts of excuses like I don't have to pay customs duties but what has that go to do with a sales tax. Customs duties I pay to Australian government and they wouldn't care if I had paid a sales tax to the US.

Spoke to 3 different agents out of which 2 of them Leo M and Remy were clueless and didn't give the right responses and only Rachel tried to help to some degree. At the end, I was to send a mail to customer services which I had done before and because I didn't even get an acknowledgment contacting these guys through chat. 

Pathetic business trying to rip off their customer.
title: By law they are supposed to collect…

author: Ingrid
text:
Read the reviews online about the ongoing issue that customers have with this site - both with purchases and with consigning. DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME WITH THEM. 
I didn't listen to those reviews and am regretting it now.
If you shop and/or consign w TRR - You WILL be disappointed too.
I had a terrible experience with their consigning department.
And I am returning a $95 Rag and Bone baseball hat that I received from them that was listed as in "Pristine - new with tags" condition.
It arrived having been worn enough that the interior of the hat was discolored with .... sweat? make up?  ... not sure - but it going back.
title: B E W A R E

author: Colleen Sifuentes
text:
First-you cannot get anyone in the phone. Second, the app tells you to email customer service. Then you send the email and they email you back telling you to text a number. Lastly, you text, as instructed; however, you are Texting a chat bot=NOT HELPFUL! 
I ordered a Gucci sweater that I have been trying to buy since 2017. I was BEYOND excited to finally find one on The Real Real. First, I paid for overnight shipping but I NEVER received the sweater hence my reason for contacting customer service. After 48 hours, I received an email refunding my overnight shipping but WITHOUT an explanation for the missing sweater and WITHOUT a full refund for the missing sweater so I had to email customer service and go through that same nonsense process. After 24-48hrs, I received an email stating that their inventory was messed up and they don’t actually have the sweater so they issued a refund for the sweater. SO DISAPPOINTING! AND NOW, that same sweater now shows “COMING SOON.” And of course, I STILL WANT THE SWEATER so I emailed customer service AGAIN to try to ensure a way for me to get that sweater at the same price I had originally purchased it, but they emailed back with the POOR response of “all you can do to watch it in the app and try to purchase it again.” WHAT IN THE WORLD!? How would you rate this customer service?
title: POOOOOR-First-you cannot get anyone in the…
